items.title: The Real Cause of Generational Conflict—and How to Fix It
items.description: For the first time in history, six generations are navigating the workplace together, all under one roof. Here’s the root of their clashes.

items.title: Elon Musk’s Social Media Meltdown Over Being Fined $140 Million Raises Important Questions About Policies on X
items.description: The billionaire sent a barrage of angry posts after a decision regarding his social media platform.

items.title: The Beauty Industry Is Being Dominated by 1 Skin Care Trend and It’s a Natural Alternative to Fillers
items.description: This year, founders across the beauty industry have been riding the skin care craze to a new part of the face.

items.title: Congress Asked To Do More To Help Founders Cope With Retail Crime, Gun Violence
items.description: Crime not only scares away customers, but it can also eat away at a founder’s bottom line.

items.title: Prepare Your Business for Higher Microsoft Software Prices
items.description: The tech giant announced new price increases of between 5 percent and 33 percent for its Microsoft 365 and Office suites — the first in four years.
